954560.name: Light Bearers Full Game
954560.description:
Features

Now included the Original Soundtrack for Light Bearers!

Access to all cosmetics available through leveling up!(All levels earned from Free To Play version carry over!)

  • 30+ Silly Hats
  • 20+ Body Colors
  • 10 Chat Colors
  • 10+ Capes
  • 10+ Spray Paints
  • 10+ Victory Decos (If you win the game, players watch you on this)
  • 6 Victory Songs (If you win the game, players hear this)
  • Plus all new cosmetics (Now up to 160+ DLC cosmetics!)

Access to all current and future shadows (currently 17 shadows)

  • Nox
  • Imperator [DLC Only]
  • Jester [DLC Only]
  • Legion
  • Mimic [DLC Only]
  • Oculus Malus
  • Stalker [DLC Only]
  • Terror [DLC Only]
  • Writhe
  • Watcher [DLC Only]
  • Krampus [DLC Only]
  • The Squawk
  • Shadow Tooth
  • Cthulu'ling [DLC Only]
  • Scourrrrrge [DLC Only]
  • Hallow [DLC Only]
  • Pestilence [DLC Only]

Support the Dev's addiction to caffeine, hotwings and living!
954560.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
